# This file is autogenerated
title: signSignatureRequest
description: Overview of the signSignatureRequest method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wallet-apis/functions/signSignatureRequest
---

Signs a signature request using the provided signer.
This method handles different types of signature requests including personal_sign, eth_signTypedData_v4, and authorization.

## Import

```ts
import { signSignatureRequest } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Usage

```ts
// Sign a personal message
const result = await client.signSignatureRequest({
type: 'personal_sign',
data: 'Hello, world!'
});

// Sign typed data (EIP-712)
const result = await client.signSignatureRequest({
type: 'eth_signTypedData_v4',
data: {
domain: { ... },
types: { ... },
primaryType: '...',
message: { ... }
}
});
```

## Parameters

### signer

`SmartAccountSigner`

- The signer to use for signing the request

### params

`SignSignatureRequestParams`

- The signature request parameters

### params.type

`string`

- The type of signature request ('personal_sign', 'eth_signTypedData_v4', or 'signature_with_authorization')

### params.data

`SignSignatureRequestParams["data"]`

- The data to sign, format depends on the signature type

## Returns

`Promise<SignSignatureRequestResult>`
A Promise that resolves to the signature result
